E01.Title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
E01.Comments: Will Byers disappears under mysterious circumstances.

E02.Title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
E02.Comments: The boys search for Will while Eleven makes a startling discovery.

E03.Title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
E03.Comments: Joyce and the boys face terrifying forces to find Will.

E04.Title: Chapter Four: The Body
E04.Comments: Hawkins Lab's secrets are revealed as the search for Will continues.

E05.Title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
E05.Comments: Hopper and Joyce uncover the truth about Hawkins Lab.

E06.Title: Chapter Six: The Monster
E06.Comments: Nancy and Jonathan confront the monster from the Upside Down.

E07.Title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
E07.Comments: Eleven helps the boys as they set a trap for the creature.

E08.Title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
E08.Comments: The final showdown with the Demogorgon.
